entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -12.9°C

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 20 this evening and minus 36 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 36 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Monday 27 February 2023
